metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16892 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Rubyzip before 1.3.0, a crafted ZIP file can bypass application checks on ZIP entry sizes because data about the uncompressed size can be spoofed. This allows attackers to cause a denial of service (disk consumption).

criterions.comment: ruby-zip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
